Articles.Content: <figure class=""><img src="https://31.media.tumblr.com/301cb0bc17ca76a396dc75e2651dee4d/tumblr_inline_njlzgi5XY11rr2wit.jpg"/></figure><figure class=""><img src="https://31.media.tumblr.com/f15c49f261cf31bbce41733f0945d9b7/tumblr_inline_njlzgpvAaB1rr2wit.png"/></figure><p>Hellblazer is quickly making a name for himself on our forums: he’s creating a large number of great desktop backgrounds in his <a href="http://goo.gl/jKWIdl">FORUM THREAD</a>. We especially like the orbital sign displayed here, but there’s a lot to choose from: from Kerbals going through re-entry to space stations and views of the Kerbal Space Center. Leave him a thank you message if you end up using one of his wallpapers!<br/></p>

Classic!

I think we need signs in game. Like flags, but bigger!
In my game the least of my issues will be traffic control!
Ditto, please put signs IN ksp game !!!!
Its good to know if theres a kraken ahead . presses f5
